issue.title: [Doc] Document parallelism of file readers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16194](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16194). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The file readers generally have some kind of capability to either read or process data in parallel.  We should make sure the documentation is clear on the capabilities of the various readers as it can help users understand what to expect (e.g. do they need to do their own parallelism on top of ours?).

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16194?focusedCommentId=17585495) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned per [project policy](https://arrow.apache.org/docs/dev/developers/bug_reports.html#issue-assignment). Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
